name: UIPreviewParameters
desc: Additional parameters to use when animating a preview interface.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a default set of preview parameters.

items.name: init(textLineRects: [NSValue])
items.desc: Creates a preview parameters object with information about the text you want to preview.

items.name: var backgroundColor: UIColor!
items.desc: The background color to display behind the preview.

items.name: var visiblePath: UIBezierPath?
items.desc: The portion of the view to show in the preview.
